experience: You and Chris both know Mark S A Smith, Aric Zion, and 29 others

Built an application development team from the ground up using a combination of onsite and offshore employees.  Created Line of Business (LOB) applications to enhance multiple operational areas including marketing, patient care, and medical billing. Responsible for the architecture and development of HL7 interfaces with nearly 3,000 providers and over 20 different EMRs leading to a 20%+ increase in the volume of referrals. Developed an application for eligibility and benefits processing which is now responsible for nearly 25% of corporate revenue due to the current high deductible insurance environment.  Skills used: ASP.Net, C#, T-SQL, SQL Server, HL7, BizTalk, EMR, Solutions Architecture, Process Improvement, Lean, SDLC, PMBOK, Documentation, Project Management

At Triplex Data we work with your existing information technology team to augment and enhance their ability to support your organization. We also act as a partner for outsourcing some or all of your information technology needs. Contact us to find out how we can help your business to use information technology more effectively.

Managed multiple technical teams including Technical Services and QC.  Responsible for improvements in workflow and quality control which lead to a significant increase in client satisfaction, and reduced lost revenue due to technical errors by 1.5 million annually.  Developed custom applications for processing data in multi-terabyte databases for large eDiscovery projects.

After completing several high profile projects at Goodrich ATS I was asked to relocate to Phoenix, AZ to manage an applications team that was struggling to provide proper levels of support to the operation. I was able to quickly turn the situation around, and I began reporting to the Vice President of AIP as part of his core management team (in addition to reporting to the regional IT Director).My responsibilities were increased quickly and I ended up managing ERP systems and custom applications at multiple locations worldwide. I lead two significant ERP implementation projects, and was responsible for the development of database driven web applications using ASP.Net, C# and SQL Server, using programming teams both onsite and remotely.

Created database driven web applications using ASP.Net, C#, T-SQL and Oracle PL/SQL.  Worked on several special projects with the executive leadership team. Received several promotions which eventually lead to a leadership position as an applications manager.

summary: I am an accomplished IT Executive (Director/Manager) with a proven track record of success across three different industries.  I have built multiple development teams including recruiting, training and hiring multiple programmers and determining the correct mix of technologies and tools to use.  I am also a full stack developer who always leads from the front, and is able to go beyond the technology stack and into areas of process improvement and business intelligence.Technical Skills and ExperienceI have over 20 years of development experience, including over 15 years specializing in Web Development.  I am experienced with ASP.Net, VB.Net, C#, JavaScript, JQuery, Razor, Java / J2EE, MVC, Bootstrap, and the MEAN stack (Mongo, Express, Angular, Node.js).  I also have spent many years improving operational efficiency through automation of common business processes and integrating disparate applications and systems.  Experienced with service oriented architecture (SOA), Web Services, Rest APIs, etc.  Proficient in Cloud and SaaS architecture including AWS and Azure.I am also highly proficient and passionate about database technologies including Relational Database Management Systems (RDBMS), SQL, T-SQL (SQL Server), PL/SQL (Oracle), MySQL, Postgres, NoSQL, JSON, SSRS, ETL, DTS, Big Data, Business Intelligence, Dashboards, etc.I have lead many development teams and have many years of experience in the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and Agile Software Development.  I have worked with and implemented multiple ERP systems including SAP, Dynamics GP, Impresa, Visual Manufacturing, and Oracle Applications for Manufacturing.You can contact me via LinkedIn or email (chrisbender999@gmail.com).
name: Chris Bender
title: Information Technology Director
